plays.text: Goal scored by Magnus Arvedson assisted by Martin Havlat and Shaun Van Allen
Penalty to Patrik Elias 2 minutes for High Sticking Jason Spezza
Goal scored by Jamie Langenbrunner assisted by Sergei Brylin and Scott Niedermayer

Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Slashing Patrick Lalime
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Marian Hossa and Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Curtis Leschyshyn 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Gionta
Penalty to Karel Rachunek 2 minutes for Tripping John Madden
Goal scored by Jeff Friesen assisted by Grant Marshall and John Madden
